/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Trees line the street, their leaves rustling in the breeze, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the expansive sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in the life of a busy street in Beijing.
